entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winnipeg Richardson Int'l Airport 6:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -10.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -11.5°C
Wind: N 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Blowing snow in open areas. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:25 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:25 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:25 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
